thread.section_title: DX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DX | dx.com
thread.title: Artūrs Kalvāns

author: Artūrs Kalvāns
title: Artūrs Kalvāns
text:
• Sometimes item build quality is low and items are out of stock for long periods of time and it is not known when the items will return in stock or how many there are left.
• User interface (especially search) could be better and it displays lots of items unrelated to keywords searched, it tiresome to scroll through lots of unnecessary things.
• Processing and shipment is long when ordering from China.
• Customer support is friendly and helpful, but sometimes it seems to lack grammar quality.
